head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GEER, ROSE W.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GEER, ROSE W.

block.p: GEER--Rose W., 92, March 30, 2007. Loving mother of Margo Geer Walker, Charles Lesher Geer and Rose Geer Thorne. Beloved sister of John G. Winslow. Devoted grandmother of David and Sacha Walker, Tara (Moy), Eliza (Karchmer), Geoa, Garrow and Sarah Geer, William and Emma Thorne. Devoted great-grandmother of Jonah and Noa. Predeceased by husband Garrow T. Geer and sister Penelope W. Baker. Funeral Tuesday, April 10, 11am, St. Mary's-in-Tuxedo Church, Fox Hill Rd., Tuxedo Park, NY. Services by Smith, Seaman & Quackenbush, Inc. Funeral Home, Monroe, NY.

Predeceased by husband Garrow T. Geer and sister Penelope W. Baker. Funeral Tuesday, April 10, 11am, St. Mary's-in-Tuxedo Church, Fox Hill Rd., Tuxedo Park, NY.
